author: Digital Foundry
description:
Digital Foundry is now fully independent! Join the DF Supporter Program and support the team: https://bit.ly/3jEGjvx

While we weren't blown away by pre-release media, review code for Ghost of Yōtei does not disappoint. John goes into depth on how the game is enhanced over Ghost of Tsushima with a deep dive into Sucker Punch's ray tracing implementation - something the developer keep quiet about throughout the pre-release period! Graphics modes are discussed and tested, the PS5 Pro advantages are highlighted, with John completing the review with audio and gameplay critiques.

Go here to check out DF merch! https://store.digitalfoundry.net

Subscribe for more Digital Foundry: http://bit.ly/DFSubscribe

02:31 - Ray Tracing Is In!
06:22 - Returning Features
07:12 - HDR Is Beautiful
08:37 - Close-Up Detail
10:37 - Some Nitpicks
12:00 - Let's Talk Graphics Modes
14:36 - Performance Tests
17:04 - The Glorious Audio of Yōtei
23:00 - Gameplay Talk an
title: Ghost of Yōtei - DF Review - PS5/PS5 Pro - A Triumphant Sequel... With Ray Tracing! - 4K HDR Video
